npc.statement: This course will help you understand how cloud computing is put to work every day. You’ll review cloud’s benefits and its real-world applications, and be introduced to ways you might begin your own career in cloud computing. But first, a question.
Imagine that you have a job developing online game software for a company like Rockstar or Valve. Which cloud service model do you think you’d use?
Keep your best guess in mind as you continue. You’ll find the answer in an upcoming topic.
Now, watch a short video about how IBM Cloud helps companies respond more effectively to their customers.
